mapper.select:
select
from t_sys_log where 1 = 1 and status >= 0
and name like concat('%',#{sysLog.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
and account_no like concat('%',#{sysLog.accountNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d')= DATE_FORMAT(#{sysLog.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%Y-%m-%d')
order by create_date desc
